variants.text: We'd like to invite you to attend the {{event_name}}, where you'll have the opportunity to meet innovative biotech startups seeking funding and connect with fellow investors.
We would be delighted to have you join us at the {{event_name}} on {{event_date}} in {{event_location}}. This is a unique opportunity to connect with key players in the {{sector}} ecosystem.
We're extending an exclusive invitation for you to attend the {{event_name}}. Your presence and insights would add tremendous value to our community gathering.

We'd like to invite {{organization_name}} to participate in the {{event_name}}. This would be an excellent opportunity to establish your presence in the European biotech ecosystem and connect with startups and investors.
variants.use_case: For startup factories - brand building angle
